data.name: Neighbors - A Visual Novel
data.detailed_description:
ENTER THE NIGHTMARE


Salem village, 1692.

When the young daughter of the village reverend fails to wake up one morning without any signs of medical issues, the fears that the villagers have been harboring for decades suddenly become real.

Could there be an invisible force haunting them? Or is it all a sign of something entirely different?

Take the role of John Proctor in this visual novel about witchcraft, betrayal, and madness. Find love, escape—or lead—the witch hunt, and take part in the most turbulent time in Massachusetts history.

FEATURES

  • 5 different endings
  • 4 Love Interests among which to pursue a relationship
  • 14 scenarios and a cast of 12+ vividly portrayed characters
  • A day cycle with a vast array of activities to perform
  • Rich lore, including original texts from the real-life story of the Witch Trials

data.short_description: Know your neighbors. Find the truth. Betray them. Experience the nightmare of the Salem Witch Trials in this horror story based on true events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
